string-array.name: edit_settings_array_descriptions
string-array.item: Change the account that you\'re using to send links.
Send links straight from your apps, without having to click Send in 2cloud.

resources.string: The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
This app cannot connect to Market. Your version of Market may be out of date. You can continue to use this app but you won\'t be able to make purchases.
